data.title: Celebrity break-ups
data.meta_description: Celeb couples who separated their ways this year.
data.text:
Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes

The high profile Hollywood marriage of Katie Holmes and Tom Cruise is over after the 'Dawson's Creek' actor filed for divorce from her superstar husband of five years.

Heidi Klum and Seal

Klum, who married musician Seal in 2005, and kept renewing their vows every year including one in India, stayed with Seal for over seven years but the couple decided to part ways amicably after growing apart.

Johnny Depp & Vanessa Paradis

Hollywood star Johnny Depp and his longtime partner, Vanessa Paradis, have split after 14 years. Depp and Paradis met in 1998 but never married during their 14-year relationship. The American actor and the French model-singer lived together with their children in France.

Kim Kardashian and Kris Humphries

Actress Kim Kardashian filed for divorce from NBA player Kris Humphries after 72 days of marriage citing irreconcilable differences in court documents filed on Monday. Kim and Kris thus joined a long list of short celebrity marriages.

Nicolas Cage & Lisa Marie Presley

Singer Lisa Marie Presley and actor Nicolas Cage got hitched in August 2002 and split in November of that year.

Britney Spears & Jason Alexander

Singer Britney married her childhood sweetheart Jason Alexander in January 2004 in Las Vegas. The two had the marriage annulled a few days later.

Carmen Electra and Dennis Rodman

Carmen Electra was married to a basketball star Dennis Rodman in November 1998 in a quickie Las Vegas wedding. Dennis Rodman's publicist took aback everybody with surprise when he said the marriage wasn't legal and that star may have been intoxicated at the time. Carmen and Dennis maintained they were deeply in love.

Eddie Murphy and Tracey Edmonds

Eddie Murphy and Tracey Edmonds were married on New Year's Day in 2008, on the Polynesian island of Bora Bora.

Jennifer Lopez & Cris Judd

Singer and actress Jennifer Lopez had her second marriage with choreographer Cris Judd on September 29, 2001. The couple split in June 2002.

Shruti Hassan & Siddharth

The one-and-half year love story of Shruti Hassan and Siddharth has reportedly come to an end. The actors, who were allegedly in a live-in relationship, didn't part ways on a pleasant note.

Photo Credit : Viral Bhayani

Ashton Kutcher & Demi Moore

Ashton Kutcher and Demi Moore are believed to have already split, following the allegations of the couple not been living together over Ashton's infidelity. Demi Moore, who was previously married to Bruce Willis, started dating Kutcher in 2003 and married him two years later.

Photo Credit : Twitter Image

Anushka Sharma & Rannveer Singh

Bollywood's latest couple Anushka Sharma and Rannveer Singh who were dating each other since they starred together in Band Baaja Baarat called it quits. The reason for the split is said to be Anushka's friendship with Ranbir Kapoor.

Photo Credit : Viral Bhayani

Priyanka & Shahid

The on and off love story of Priyanka and Shahid finally saw the curtains down. The duo had different takes on love and their ideologies did not match.

Photo Credit : Viral Bhayani

John Abraham & Bipasha Basu

John Abraham and Bipasha Basu, after being with each other for a decade, have now called off their relationship. And, both are now not seen attending the social dos together.

Photo Credit : Publicity Image

Jennifer Lopez & Marc Anthony

Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony split-up after seven years of marriage. The pair, who are parents to 3-year-old twins Max and Emme, said that the reason behind the break-up is "months of non-stop arguing."

Photo Credit : Twitter Image

Elizabeth Hurley & Arun Nayar

Elizabeth Hurley, London based model and Arun Nayar got married in India in 2007. The couple parted ways early this year as Liz found new love in cricketer Shane Warne.

Mohammad Azharuddin & Sangeeta Bijlani

Former Indian cricket team captain Mohammad Azharuddin and former Bollywood starlet Sangeeta Bijlani broke up after 14 years of marriage. While no one has come out and given reasons for the separation, rumours are rife that it is because of his closeness to badminton player Jwala Gutta.
